SELECT ORDER_NUM , MAX(MEM_ID) MEM_ID , SUM((SELECT PRICE FROM book WHERE BOOK_NUM = shop_buy.BOOK_NUM) * BUY_CNT) PRICE , MAX(BUY_DATE) BUY_DATE , CASE COUNT(ORDER_NUM) - 1 WHEN 0 THEN MAX((SELECT TITLE FROM book WHERE BOOK_NUM = shop_buy.BOOK_NUM)) ELSE CONCAT(MAX((SELECT TITLE FROM book WHERE BOOK_NUM = shop_buy.BOOK_NUM)) , ' 외 ' , COUNT(ORDER_NUM) - 1 , '건') END TITLE FROM shop_buy
WHERE 1 = 1
AND ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum}
AND MEM_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memId}, '%')
AND BUY_DATE >= #{fromDate}
AND BUY_DATE <= ADDDATE(#{toDate}, 1)
GROUP BY ORDER_NUM ORDER BY BUY_DATE DESC

SELECT BUY_NUM , BUY_CNT , TITLE , PRICE , PRICE * BUY_CNT AS TOTAL_PRICE , ATTACHED_IMG_NAME FROM shop_buy S INNER JOIN book B ON S.BOOK_NUM = B.BOOK_NUM INNER JOIN BOOK_IMG I ON I.BOOK_NUM = S.BOOK_NUM WHERE IS_MAIN = 'Y' AND ORDER_NUM = #{orderNum}
